name: Keep my Google Doodle: Summer by Takashi Murakami
description: Permanently replace the logo on Google homepage by the “First Day of Summer by Takashi Murakami” Google Doodle.

user.name: The Cupcake Generator
user.about: Generating cupcakes and userstyles with love since 1673 ♥ Powered by busy critters and sleepy snails.

additional_info: UPDATES 2015/05/10 • Original release ADVICES This userstyle only apply on the regular desktop Google Search homepage, doesn't works with mobile version. Also doesn't replace the logo in the search results page header. KNOWN ISSUES This Google Doodle may appear blurry with high density/Retina displays. CREDITS ©2004–present Takashi Murakami All credits to their original authors.
